page.title: 09N.S. AND THE RIVER CREE
page.content: {The River Cree}starting as the Farden Burn,rises at Palmaddie Hill, which is situated just north of Glentrool.The river has many tributaries,the largest of which are the Minnoch and the Penkiln Burn.When it reaches the end of its journey it enters Wigtown Bay.The largest town situated on the Cree is Newton Stewart.With its many bends and curves the river is said to spell its name. The Cree has its own song"The Bonnie Banks O' Cree"written by a local person.It is also mentioned in the song "Bonnie Galloway."
